title: Designing Personalized Online Language Education Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate language proficiency
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance workplace language competencies for managers/leaders. Applies a personalized content recommendation system based on individual learning patterns and achievement data.

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their workplace language communication skills by 30% within six months
Through personalized learning data analysis, learners receive recommendations for at least two customized microlearning contents weekly
Formative assessments enable diagnosing and addressing learning gaps every two weeks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
